item.title: All the news that is fit to print.
item.story: Today the New York times declined to print anything, saying nothing was fit to print today.

item.title: Malformed XML wreaks havoc on trading floor
item.story: Oil stocks declined precipitously today on no news. Pundits blame malformed XML leading to a loss of faith in bits in general, and drill bits getting caught up in the generalized panic.
